text: Losing Ground may refer to: * Losing Ground (book), a critique of welfare lrograms by Charles Murray published in 1984 * Losing Ground (1982 film) * Losing Ground (2005 film) * Losing Ground (song)", a 1997 song by Groove Terminator * Losing Ground, a song by Italian melodeath band Disarmonia Mundi, from The Isolation Game
title: Losing Ground
